caller_intent: The caller wants to inform Alliance Insurance about a mortgage transfer and update their policy details to reflect the new mortgage information, including the escrow and new mortgagee clause.
resolution_steps: Agent explains the need for a letter containing the updated mortgagee clause, new loan number, and address.
Agent provides the email address (support@myallianceinsurance.com) for sending the letter directly to an agent.
Agent clarifies that the letter should include specific details to facilitate policy updates and communication with the new mortgage company.
Agent suggests including a note in the email to notify the caller once the update is completed.
knowledge_required: Process for updating mortgage insurance policies during loan transfers
Required documentation (letter with mortgagee clause, loan number, address)
Internal communication protocols for policy updates
summary: A caller notified Alliance Insurance of a mortgage transfer and requested policy updates. The agent guided them to send a letter with specific details (new mortgagee clause, loan number, address) to a dedicated email address. The agent also mentioned they would notify the caller via email once the update was completed.
